resources:
Auto-Away 0.1
General
Start Starts the Auto-Away service
Silence on Start Silence all sounds except media & alarms on service start
Preferences
Custom Message Message to send out when a text is received Hey, I\'m busy, I\'ll talk to you later
Inform Recipient Adds an "Auto-Away" prefix to your custom message
Response Delay Time (in seconds) to delay message response
Notification Log Shows how many Auto-Away responses were sent out
Repeat Reponses Respond two or more times during a service lifecycle
